whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.subtitle: We are a team of passionate developers and designers who believe in the power of technology to change the world and improve lives.

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: Our journey began in 2022 with a simple dream: to provide innovative technology solutions that help companies grow and thrive in the digital age.
From humble beginnings as a small team of passionate developers, we have grown into a comprehensive technology company serving clients across various industries.
We believe technology should not only solve problems but also inspire and empower people to achieve their dreams.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To empower businesses with innovative technology solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and success.

vision.title: Our Vision

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and process

questions.question: What services do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer comprehensive technology solutions including web development, mobile applications, AI solutions, and UI/UX design. Our team specializes in modern technologies and can handle projects of any scale.

questions.question: How long does a typical project take?
questions.answer: Project timelines vary depending on complexity and scope. A simple website might take 2-4 weeks, while complex applications can take 3-6 months. We provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation.

questions.question: Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive support and maintenance packages to ensure your application continues to perform optimally. This includes updates, security patches, and technical support.

questions.question: What is your development process?
questions.answer: We follow an agile development methodology with regular client communication, iterative development, and thorough testing. Our process includes discovery, design, development, testing, and deployment phases.

questions.question: Can you work with existing systems?
questions.answer: We have extensive experience integrating with existing systems and can help modernize legacy applications or build new features that work seamlessly with your current infrastructure.

questions.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
questions.answer: We specialize in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, mobile development with React Native and Flutter, and AI/ML technologies including TensorFlow and various cloud platforms.

questions.question: How do you ensure data security?
questions.answer: We follow the highest security standards in our development process, implement advanced encryption, and apply best security practices. All data is protected, and we sign confidentiality agreements with our clients.

questions.question: Can I track my project's progress?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide a project management system that allows you to monitor progress, review completed milestones, and communicate with the development team. We also send regular reports and hold follow-up meetings.

cta.title: Didn't find an answer to your question?
cta.subtitle: Our team is ready to assist you, reach out via WhatsApp or Email!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At StyleraTech, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your data. This policy explains how we collect, use, store, and share information when you interact with our website or services.

sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.paragraph: We collect two types of data: information you voluntarily provide (e.g., name, email, contact details via forms) and information collected automatically (e.g., IP address, browser type, pages visited, and cookies).

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
list: Deliver our services, respond to inquiries, and follow up on requests.
Improve performance and user experience through analytics.
Send important updates related to services or policies.

sections.heading: Legal Basis for Processing
sections.paragraph: We process your data based on your consent, contract performance where applicable, our legitimate interests in improving our services, and compliance with legal obligations.

sections.heading: Cookies
sections.paragraph: We use cookies to enhance performance and personalize content. You can manage preferences through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may limit certain functionality.

sections.heading: Data Sharing
sections.paragraph: We do not sell your data. We may share it with trusted service providers to support website functionality (such as hosting and analytics) under data protection agreements.

sections.heading: Data Security and Retention
sections.paragraph: We apply technical and organizational measures to protect your data. We retain information only as long as needed for the stated purposes or as required by law.

sections.heading: Your Rights
sections.paragraph: To exercise your rights, contact us using the email provided in the website footer.

sections.heading: Third-Party Links
sections.paragraph: Our site may contain links to external websites beyond our control. We recommend reviewing their privacy policies.

sections.heading: Updates to This Policy
sections.paragraph: We may update this policy from time to time. The last updated date will be indicated. Your continued use signifies acceptance of any changes.

sections.heading: Contact Us
sections.paragraph: For any questions about this policy, reach us at: contact@styleratech.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms govern your use of the StyleraTech website and services. By using our site, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

sections.heading: Eligibility and Acceptable Use
list: You represent that you have the legal capacity to use the site and accept these Terms.
You must not misuse the site, attempt unauthorized access, or disrupt services.
You agree to comply with all applicable local and international laws.

sections.heading: Offerings and Services
sections.paragraph: We provide custom software development, design, and digital experiences. Service details or pricing may change, and the site will be updated accordingly.

sections.heading: Intellectual Property
sections.paragraph: All trademarks, logos, content, and visual materials on the site are owned by or licensed to StyleraTech. Reuse is not permitted without written permission.

sections.heading: User-Provided Content
sections.paragraph: When you submit messages or forms, you grant us a license to use them for service delivery and communication. You warrant that the content is lawful and non-infringing.

sections.heading: Confidentiality and Privacy
sections.paragraph: We respect your privacy and process your data according to our Privacy Policy. Your use of the site constitutes acceptance of that policy.

sections.heading: Your Responsibilities
list: Safeguard the confidentiality of your data
Refrain from harmful or abusive activities

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
sections.paragraph: The site is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any indirect, consequential, or incidental damages arising from your use of the site.

sections.heading: Indemnification
sections.paragraph: You agree to indemnify and hold StyleraTech harmless from any claims arising out of your use of the site or breach of these Terms.

sections.heading: Termination and Suspension
sections.paragraph: We may suspend or terminate your access to the site upon violation of these Terms or for any reasonable cause at our discretion.

sections.heading: Governing Law
sections.paragraph: These Terms are governed by the laws applicable in our operating jurisdiction unless otherwise specified in a signed agreement.

sections.heading: Changes to These Terms
sections.paragraph: We may update these Terms from time to time. Your continued use of the site after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.

sections.heading: Contact
sections.paragraph: For questions regarding these Terms, contact us at: contact@styleratech.com
